chat_history.message:
Hello, My iPhone 13 has the above problem: The pink color of the packaging has dyed the casing, and you can't get it off. See Picture

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

Due to the protective cover around the device, the mobile phone turned pink.

You want to make an offer to the customer or we'll ask the seller to return the device.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Please relay the message to the customer that we are sorry that the customer is unhappy with our product. Rather than sending a return, would you consider a 50 euros commercial gesture instead? You could save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers in facilitating a return of a device which is perfectly functional and fit to use for many years ahead.  Do let us know whether the customer accepts this commercial gesture. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello ecomobile,

The customer accepts your offer.

Please refund the customer 50.00 euros.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have given the customer 50 euros as commercial gesture. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
